Moisture sensor test - Stability


Sensor probe : 
Arduino type

Drive : 
2k load resistors
Algorithm : OSC3 (0,1,0,-1), 250 ms cycle time, 1 min average value 

Raw ADC values are from 0 to 4095 :

  1437 for 1.330 V measured with a voltmeter.
  1319 for 1.231 V measured with a voltmeter.
  2775 for 2.437 V ...
  2790 for 2.445 V
  2801 for 2.458 V
     0 for 0.138 V

Test solution :
1 glass distilled water + 6 drop saturated salt solution (2-3 k, 1964 *uS/cm)

Test Timeline :  
  0.00000000000000 Test start : 2017/04/04 09:32, 20.6 Â°C (ambiant)
